This sequence aligns with the actions described in Option C. 

Earlier, at [0-1], the lady was seen holding the knife and inserting it into the stump, which matches the initial step in Option C. The dense caption confirms the actions of inserting the knife, sliding it, and reinserting it, which are consistent with Option C.
